attributes.action: Make civil servants and government / local government decision makers personally and financially liable for errors and mismanagement and in particular mismanagement of our finances and resources … in particular Hospital Trusts and Local Government … why do our Council Tax Bills keep going up, perhaps another green / stealth TAX!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why do any of us bother paying TAX / PAYE, when the Government has spent all the money which should be in the National Pension Pot...?
Why does our NHS not work … it’s had enough money fed in to it!
How the hell can the Police do their Job properly, when it appears no one has any power to deal with teenage hooligans … are we really a first World Nation or have we lost our way?
